description:
Position Overview :

The Sponsorship Sales Account Executive is responsible for producing new corporate sponsorship sales revenue and retaining assigned accounts.

Essential Job Functions :
• Sell new local corporate sponsorship for the club.
• Renew sponsorship accounts that are assigned.
• Sell high level multi-layered partnerships.
• Visit with accounts as well as maintain and develop relationship with sponsorship clients throughout the season and off-season to ensure personalized, continual contact.
• Set in person appointments with key decision makers.
• Assist in the creation and implementation of consumer and business to business based promotions.
• Prospect for quality leads.
• Manage and update all accounts and leads using Salesforce CRM

Skill Requirements :

We will not consider any applicants without specific advertising sales experience.
• Bachelor's Degree in related field required.
• Candidate MUST have a minimum of 1 years minimum experience in advertising or sponsorship saleswith a proven track record of sales success.
• Superior communication skills a must.
• Working knowledge of all Microsoft Office and Google Software.

We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, age, disability, gender identity, marital or veteran status, or any other protected class.

Job Questions :
• Do you any experience selling sports sponsorships or groups in the past? If so please elaborate.
• This position is a full-time, in-person role at our Amarillo office located in Amarillo, TX. If selected for this position, when could you begin employment?
• What is your salary expectation for this position?
• Do you have any experience using Salesforce CRM in any of your previous sales positions. If not, what CRM did you utilize to keep track of sales and client needs?
• Are you legally authorized to work in the United States for our Company?
